attributes.action: All MP should be drug tested regularly
attributes.additional_details: MP set example to others and create laws on drugs use in the UK so the fact there not subject to regular drug tests is ludicrous
attributes.background: I believe all MP should be drug tested regularly as part of there role as a MP. The public rely on these individuals to keep us safe MP set example to others and create laws on drugs use in the UK so the fact there not subject to regular drug tests is ludicrous
